===Etymology===
From the Lanshan ([[蘭]][[山]], lit. "Orchid Hills") range to the city's south.<ref>Jun Jing, ''The Temple of Memories'', [https://books.google.com.hk/books?id=3leAld7M7p0C&pg=PA4 p. 4].</ref> As a city, from its status as the seat of the former prefecture.
